name: Crux
storyline: The gods of blood demand a new champion, and it's your turn to take the trials. In Crux you are a cultist of the blood gods, trained since childhood to take the trials to become the blood gods' champion. Your time has come to prove yourself worthy of the title and enter the arenas and attempt to defeat their hordes and guardians. With every boss defeated you grow more powerful from abilities granted to you. But will it be enough to become the Crux champion?
summary: The gods of blood demand a new champion, and it's your turn to undertake the trials. Crux is a fast-paced single-player arena shooter that has you facing hordes of enemies. Use your fluid movement abilities, trusty weapons and the powers of the blood gods to conquer the trials.
